term.title: sum of states

item.text: The total number of states for a system corresponding to an energy ɛ less than or equal to a specified value.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 149. 'A glossary of terms used in chemical kinetics, including reaction dynamics (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 188 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668010149)
